description.zh-cn: 中华民国无党籍政治人物，曾任劳动部部长、蒙藏委员会委员长、内政部政务次长、嘉义县副县长等职务。她是中华民国总统蔡英文的表姊。
description.en: An independent Taiwanese politician who served as the Minister of Labor, Chairperson of the Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs Commission, Political Deputy Minister of the Interior, and Deputy Magistrate of Chiayi County. She is a cousin of ROC President Tsai Ing-wen.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的中央二级行政机关，负责劳动政策、劳工关系及就业服务等事务。
description.en: A cabinet-level ministry of the Republic of China that oversees labor affairs, including labor policy, industrial relations, and employment services.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长，现任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Premier of the Executive Yuan and is the current President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，林美珠的前任劳动部部长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and Lin Mei-chu's predecessor as Minister of Labor.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，林美珠的继任劳动部部长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and Lin Mei-chu's successor as Minister of Labor.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院曾设立的部会，负责处理蒙古、西藏等地方事务，现已裁撤。
description.en: A former ministry-level body under the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China responsible for Mongolian and Tibetan affairs, which has since been dissolved.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，林美珠的前任蒙藏委员会委员长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and Lin Mei-chu's predecessor as Chairperson of the Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，林美珠的继任蒙藏委员会委员长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and Lin Mei-chu's successor as Chairperson of the Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关。
description.en: The executive branch of the government of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院会议的成员，为不管部会之部长。
description.en: A member of the Executive Yuan Council in the Republic of China, serving as a minister without portfolio.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国嘉义县的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Chiayi County, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，在林美珠担任嘉义县副县长期间任县长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Magistrate of Chiayi County while Lin Mei-chu was the Deputy Magistrate.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管民政、户政、地政、役政、警政、消防等内政事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The ministry of the interior of the Republic of China, responsible for domestic affairs such as civil administration, household registration, land administration, conscription, police, and fire services.

description.zh-cn: 政府部门中部长或大臣的副手，是一个官职级别。
description.en: A rank for a deputy to a minister in a government department.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，在林美珠担任内政部政务次长期间任内政部部长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Minister of the Interior while Lin Mei-chu was the Political Deputy Minister.

nodes.id: 中华民国中央选举委员会

zh-cn: 中华民国中央选举委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华民国负责选举、罢免、公民投票事务的独立机关。
description.en: The independent government agency of the Republic of China responsible for managing elections, recalls, and referendums.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，在林美珠担任中央选举委员会秘书长期间任主任委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Chairperson of the Central Election Commission while Lin Mei-chu was the Secretary-General.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国内政部的内部单位，负责民政事务。
description.en: An internal unit of the Ministry of the Interior of the Republic of China, responsible for civil affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，在林美珠担任内政部民政司司长期间任内政部部长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Minister of the Interior while Lin Mei-chu was the Director-General of the Department of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国首都与直辖市，林美珠的出生地。
description.en: The capital and a special municipality of the Republic of China (Taiwan), and the birthplace of Lin Mei-chu.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国法官，林美珠的丈夫，曾任最高行政法院院长，并曾为汤英伸案的起诉检察官。
description.en: A judge in the Republic of China, spouse of Lin Mei-chu, former President of the Supreme Administrative Court, and was the prosecuting prosecutor in the Tang Ying-shen case.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任第14、15任中华民国总统。她是林美珠的表妹。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the 14th and 15th President of the Republic of China. She is Lin Mei-chu's cousin.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的国立大学，林美珠的母校。
description.en: A national university located in Taipei, Taiwan, and the alma mater of Lin Mei-chu.

description.zh-cn: 曾为中华民国内政部下设机构，负责著作权相关事务。
description.en: A former agency under the Ministry of the Interior of the Republic of China responsible for copyright matters.

nodes.id: 台湾金联资产管理公司

zh-cn: 台湾金联资产管理公司

description.zh-cn: 台湾一家处理不良金融资产的资产管理公司。
description.en: A Taiwanese asset management corporation that deals with non-performing financial assets.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 由林全担任行政院院长所组成的中华民国内阁。
description.en: The cabinet of the Republic of China formed by Premier Lin Chuan.

description.zh-cn: 由赖清德担任行政院院长所组成的中华民国内阁。
description.en: The cabinet of the Republic of China formed by Premier Lai Ching-te.

nodes.id: 最高行政法院 (中华民国)

zh-cn: 最高行政法院 (中华民国)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的终审行政法院。
description.en: The final instance administrative court of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 台湾原住民青年，因1986年的一起刑事案件而闻名。
description.en: A Taiwanese indigenous youth known for a criminal case in 1986.

description.zh-cn: 1986年于台湾发生的一起重大刑事案件，涉及原住民青年汤英伸，林美珠的丈夫吴明鸿为此案的起诉检察官。
description.en: A major criminal case in Taiwan in 1986 involving indigenous youth Tang Ying-shen. Lin Mei-chu's husband, Wu Ming-hung, was the prosecuting prosecutor in this case.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍立法委员，曾就工时问题质询时任劳动部部长的林美珠。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and Kuomintang legislator who questioned then-Minister of Labor Lin Mei-chu regarding working hours.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍立法委员，曾批评时任劳动部部长的林美珠为“神隐部长”。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and Kuomintang legislator who criticized then-Minister of Labor Lin Mei-chu as the 'invisible minister'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的三所高等行政法院之一，位于台北市。
description.en: One of the three High Administrative Courts in the Republic of China, located in Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠出生于中华民国台北市。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu was born in Taipei, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠与吴明鸿为夫妻关系。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu and Wu Ming-hung are spouses.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠是蔡英文的表姊。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu is Tsai Ing-wen's maternal elder cousin.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠于1972至1976年就读于国立政治大学法律学系，获得学士学位。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu studied at the Department of Law, National Chengchi University from 1972 to 1976, earning a bachelor's degree.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠于1976至1982年就读于国立政治大学法律研究所，获得硕士学位。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu studied at the Graduate Institute of Law, National Chengchi University from 1976 to 1982, earning a master's degree.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠于2017年2月8日至2018年2月26日期间担任第四任劳动部部长。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu served as the fourth Minister of Labor from February 8, 2017, to February 26, 2018.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠于2016年5月20日至2017年2月7日期间担任第30任蒙藏委员会委员长。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu served as the 30th Chairperson of the Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs Commission from May 20, 2016, to February 7, 2017.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠于2016年5月20日至2017年2月7日期间担任行政院政务委员，负责督导内政部与法务部。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu served as a Minister without Portfolio of the Executive Yuan from May 20, 2016, to February 7, 2017, responsible for supervising the Ministry of the Interior and the Ministry of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠于2010年5月17日至2014年12月期间担任嘉义县副县长。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu served as the Deputy Magistrate of Chiayi County from May 17, 2010, to December 2014.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠于2006年8月至2008年5月19日期间担任内政部政务次长。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu served as the Political Deputy Minister of the Interior from August 2006 to May 19, 2008.

relationships.target: 中华民国中央选举委员会

description.zh-cn: 林美珠于2004年11月至2006年8月期间担任中央选举委员会秘书长。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu served as the Secretary-General of the Central Election Commission from November 2004 to August 2006.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠于2002年9月至2004年3月期间担任内政部民政司司长。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu served as the Director-General of the Department of Civil Affairs, Ministry of the Interior from September 2002 to March 2004.

relationships.target: 台湾金联资产管理公司

description.zh-cn: 林美珠曾短暂担任台湾金联资产管理公司董事长，因舆论争议于就职一日后辞职。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu briefly served as the Chairperson of Taiwan Financial Asset Service Corporation, resigning one day after taking office due to public controversy.

position.zh-cn: 蒙藏委员会委员长、政务委员、劳动部部长
position.en: Chairperson of the Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs Commission, Minister without Portfolio, Minister of Labor

description.zh-cn: 林美珠在林全担任行政院院长期间，先后担任蒙藏委员会委员长、政务委员及劳动部部长。
description.en: During Lin Chuan's tenure as Premier, Lin Mei-chu served successively as Chairperson of the Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs Commission, Minister without Portfolio, and Minister of Labor.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠在赖清德担任行政院院长期间，担任劳动部部长。
description.en: During Lai Ching-te's tenure as Premier, Lin Mei-chu served as the Minister of Labor.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠在张花冠担任嘉义县县长期间，担任副县长。
description.en: While Chang Hwa-kuan was the Magistrate of Chiayi County, Lin Mei-chu served as the Deputy Magistrate.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠在李逸洋担任内政部部长期间，担任政务次长。
description.en: While Lee Yi-yang was the Minister of the Interior, Lin Mei-chu served as the Political Deputy Minister.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠在张政雄担任中央选举委员会主任委员期间，担任秘书长。
description.en: While Chang Cheng-hsiung was the Chairperson of the Central Election Commission, Lin Mei-chu served as the Secretary-General.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠在余政宪担任内政部部长期间，担任内政部民政司司长。
description.en: While Yu Cheng-hsien was the Minister of the Interior, Lin Mei-chu served as the Director-General of the Department of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠在苏贞昌担任行政院院长期间，曾担任内政部政务次长。
description.en: During Su Tseng-chang's tenure as Premier, Lin Mei-chu served as the Political Deputy Minister of the Interior.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国民党立委王育敏在立法院质询时任劳动部长林美珠，质疑其对游览车驾驶工时的见解。
description.en: Then-KMT legislator Wang Yu-min questioned then-Minister of Labor Lin Mei-chu in the Legislative Yuan about her views on the working hours of tour bus drivers.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国民党立委许淑华在立法院质询时，批评时任劳动部长林美珠为“神隐部长”。
description.en: Then-KMT legislator Hsu Shu-hua criticized then-Minister of Labor Lin Mei-chu during an interpellation in the Legislative Yuan, calling her the 'invisible minister'.

description.zh-cn: 吴明鸿曾担任汤英伸案的起诉检察官。
description.en: Wu Ming-hung served as the prosecuting prosecutor in the Tang Ying-shen case.

description.zh-cn: 民政司是内政部的内部单位。
description.en: The Department of Civil Affairs is an internal unit of the Ministry of the Interior.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠为林全内阁的成员。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu was a member of the Lin Chuan cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 林美珠为赖清德内阁的成员。
description.en: Lin Mei-chu was a member of the Lai Ching-te cabinet.
